sentences.sContent: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.sCn: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.sContent: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.sCn: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.sContent: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.sCn: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.sContent: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.sCn: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.sContent: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.sCn: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

phrases.pCn: 了解，知道……的情况；知道关于
[口语][用作插入语]你也知道；你是知道的，不是吗?
◎知道是怎么回事，深知其中滋味
如你所知；正如你知道的
众所周知；正如我们所知
有头脑；明事理；不会上当

words.tran: 已知的；知名的；大家知道的
博学的；狡猾的；心照不宣的
可知的；能认识的；易知的
